description: partial refund of a completed buyer payment

clarification_templates.txn_id: What is the PayPal transaction ID for this payment?

clarification_templates.reason: Why are you issuing this partial refund?
clarification_templates.currency: In which currency was the payment made?
clarification_templates.date: When was the original payment completed?

description: full refund of a completed buyer payment

clarification_templates.txn_id: Please share the PayPal transaction ID for the payment you want to refund.
clarification_templates.reason: Why do you need to issue this full refund?

description: problem while sending money to a contact

clarification_templates.amount: What amount were you trying to send?

clarification_templates.receiver: Who were you sending the money to?

clarification_templates.date: When did you try the transfer?
clarification_templates.bank_name: Which bank account were you trying to send money from?
clarification_templates.error_message: What error message did you see when the send failed?
